Key: All selected plants will be destroyed immediately.
English: All selected plants will be destroyed immediately.
Chinese: 所选植物将被立即摧毁

Key: Are you sure? Progress since your last save will be lost.
English: Are you sure? Progress since your last save will be lost.
Chinese: 自上次保存以后的进度将丢失，您确定吗？

Key: Build on top of existing terrain or right click to remove build wall orders.
English: Build on top of existing terrain or right click to remove build wall orders.
Chinese: 在现有地形上建造或单击右键来移除建造墙的命令。

English: Animal breeders use the animal pen to tame and care for livestock.
Chinese: 伺养者利用动物畜栏来驯养和照料牲畜。

English: Fires bolts at approaching enemies. Must be manned by a colonist and supplied with ballista bolts.
Chinese: 以向接近的敌人发射螺栓。必须由殖民者操控并提供螺栓。

English: Wooden bed built for maximum comfort and pleasure. Higher quality beds improve mood and recover energy faster.
Chinese: 舒适的木床可以提高满意度。高质量的床可以改善心情，更快地恢复精力。

English: For crafting armour and weapons using metal
Chinese: 铁匠能够使用金属来制造盔甲和武器。

English: Bookshelves provide entertainment and allow skilled workers to teach others. Paper is required to write books.
Chinese: 书架能够提供娱乐，并允许传授高熟练度技能。编写书籍需要消耗纸张。

English: For crafting ranged weapons and their ammunition.
Chinese: 制弓匠能够制作远程武器及其弹药。

English: For processing of raw logs into planks and other wooden items
Chinese: 木工台可将原木加工成木板及其他木制品。

English: Fires rocks at approaching enemies in a high arc. Must be manned by a colonist and supplied with blocks.
Chinese: 以高角度向接近的敌人发射石块。必须由殖民者操控并提供石块。

English: Workers will store unused equipment and tools here
Chinese: 工人将闲置的设备和工具存放在这里。

English: Crafter's assemble processed items into tools and weapons here.
Chinese: 工匠将加工过的物品在这里组装成工具和武器。

English: Basic wooden door that comes with a lock
Cools down rooms. Requires connection to water source through pipes.
Chinese: 能够冷却房间。需要通过管道连接水源。

English: Wooden fences make a quick 2 block high barrier
Chinese: 高度为2个方块的木质屏障

English: Source of heat. More efficient than the camp fire.
Smelters produce metal ingots from metal ore here. Also burns or melts down unwanted items.
Chinese: 能够熔炼金属矿石并生产金属锭。还可以烧毁或熔化不需要的物品。

English: Allows airflow and blocks off rooms. Opens for colonists to crawl through.
Chinese: 阻隔房间但允许气流通过。殖民者能够爬行通过。

English: For cutting raw gems to produce jewelry and trinkets.
Chinese: 能够切割珠宝原石来生产珠宝和小饰品。

English: Cooks turn raw food into meals here.
Chinese: 厨师能够在这里将生食做成熟食。

English: Allows colonists to move up and down freely.
Chinese: 允许殖民者能够自由上下移动。

English: Weavers process raw fiber into cloth or rope. Cloth can then be made into bags or clothing.
Chinese: 纺织工将原纤维加工成布或绳，进而将布制成袋子或衣服。

English: Mason's turn raw stone into blocks and stone walls.
Chinese: 石匠将原石加工成石块和石墙。

English: Required to connect water pumps to windmills.
Chinese: 需要将水泵连接至风车。

English: Designated point for trade and first contact with other factions. The quality of the meeting room impresses visiting factions and increases the chance of positive interactions.
Chinese: 与其他势力首次接触及指定交易点。高质量的会议室会给来访势力留下深刻印象，能够未来增加积极互动的机会。

English: Researchers research in the research lab
Chinese: 殖民者使用研究台进行研究。

English: For producing salt and fresh water from salt water. Requires a pipe connection to salty water.
Chinese: 用于从咸水中生产盐和淡水。需要管道连接至咸水。

English: Brewers make drinks here. Requires a pipe connection to fresh water.
Chinese: 酿酒师在这里酿酒。需要管道连接至淡水。

English: Large stone gate for better defense.
Chinese: 石门可以更好地防御敌人。
能够提高在行走在上面的速度。

English: Small wooden or stone table for eating or drinking.
Chinese: 用于就餐的木桌或石桌。

English: Light source to brighten up an area
Chinese: 能够照亮一片区域的光源。

English: Connects water pumps or water sources to buildings which require water.
Chinese: 连接需水建筑物至水泵或水源。

English: Pumps water from input to output. Pipes should be connected to the input and output. Requires connection to a windmill with mechanisms.
Chinese: 水泵能够输送水。两端需要连接水管。需要连接至风车。

English: Windmills power water pumps. Ensure that both the front and back of the windmill is not obstructed.
Chinese: 风车能够驱动水泵。确保风车前后没有阻挡物。

English: Windows let natural light into rooms.
Chinese: 窗户能够让自然光进入房间。
能够提高在行走在上面的速度。

Key: Click on planet to select embark location. {0} to rotate the globe.
English: Click on planet to select embark location. {0} to rotate the globe.
Chinese: 点击星球选择登录位置。{0}旋转星球。

Key: Creature will die if total blood reaches 0.
English: Creature will die if total blood reaches 0.
Chinese: 如果血量降至0，生物将会死亡。

Key: Embark uses Unity analytics to automatically collect crash reports.
English: Embark uses Unity analytics to automatically collect crash reports.
Chinese: 使用Unity自动收集游戏错误报告

English: Workers will mark a spot as inaccesible if they fail to reach it repeatedly.
Chinese: 如果殖民者不能多次到达某个地点，他们会将该地标记为不可进入。

English: Edible plants can be turned into meals in a kitchen.
Chinese: 可食用植物可在厨房中做成食物。

English: Average elevation of region. Higher regions are colder and usually more mountainous.
Chinese: 平均海拔高度。海拔越高温度越低，通常多山地。

English: Health of plant, lack of water and extreme temperatures can cause plants to die.
Chinese: 植物的健康值，缺水或极端温度会导致其死亡。

English: Materials required for construction. Items Delivered (Items on the way) / Items Required
Chinese: 建造所需的原料。已交付物品（递送中的物品）/需要的物品

English: Maturity of plant, harvesting fully grown plants nets more resources.
Chinese: 植物成熟，收获完全成熟的植物可以获得更多的资源。

English: Current items stored in stockpile / Total space in stockpile
Chinese: 库存中的当前物品/库存中的总空间

Key: Item cannot be made becaue no raw materials have been found. Harvest suitable raw material first.
English:
Item cannot be made becaue no raw materials have been found.
Harvest suitable raw material first.
Chinese: 由于没有原材料，无法制作该物品，请先获得相应原材料。

English: Caring and capture tamed animals. Requires an Animal Pen built.
Chinese: 捕捉并照料已驯服的动物。需要建造动物畜栏。

English: Craft metal armour. Requires a Blacksmith built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 制作金属盔甲。需要建造铁匠台，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Craft ranged weapons and ammunition. Requires a Bowyer built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 制作远程武器及弹药。需要建造制弓台，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Brew drinks. Requires a Still built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 酿造饮料。需要建造酿酒台，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Build wooden buildings and craft wooden items. Requires a Carpenter's Workshop built.
Chinese: 建造木质建筑和木制品。需要建造木工台。

English: Cook food. Requires a Kitchen built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 烹饪食物。需要建造厨房，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Craft simple items. Requires a Workshop built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 制作简单的物品。需要建造制作台，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Treat wounded colonists. Free bed required. Rescuing unconscious colonists uses the hauling job.
Chinese: 治疗受伤的殖民者。需要空余床位。营救失去意识的殖民者需要拖运。

English: Plant plants and harvest them when mature. Requires a designated farm placed using the Place Farm tool.
Chinese: 种植作物并收获成熟作物。需要建造农田。

English: Transport items around. Place Stockpiles strategically to ensure your workshops always have a close supply of raw materials.
Chinese: 运输物品。恰当搬运并储存物品，以确保所有的工坊均有充足的原材料供应。

English: Harvest wild plants for food. Designate plants to harvest using the Harvest Plants tool. Will wait for plants to mature before harvesting.
Chinese: 采集野生植物作为食物。使用收割植物工具指定需要收割的成熟植物。

English: Hunt animals for food and hides. Ranged weapon recommended.
Chinese: 狩猎动物以获得食物和皮毛。推荐装备远程武器。

English: Cutting of gems and making of jewelry. Requires a Jewellers Workshop.
Chinese: 切割宝石并制作珠宝。需要建造珠宝切割台。

English: Build stone buildings, walls, and craft stone items at the Mason's Workshop.
Chinese: 在石匠台建造石质建筑、墙和石制物品。

English: Mine dirt or rock. Requires a designated area using the Dig tool.
Chinese: 挖掘泥土和岩石。需要使用挖掘工具指定挖掘区域。

English: Research new technologies in the Research Lab.
Making of salt through desalination of sea water or processing of rock salt at the Saltworks.
Chinese: 通过淡化海水或在盐工坊加工岩盐来制盐。

English: Turn ore and fuel into metal ingots. Requires a Furnace built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 将金属矿石和燃料转化为金属锭。需要建造熔炉，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Craft weapons. Requires a Blacksmith built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 制作武器。需要建造铁匠台，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Craft cloth and clothing. Requires a Loom built and make item job designated in the Make Item panel.
Chinese: 制作布和衣服。需要建造纺织布机，并在相关面板中指定制造物品。

English: Cut down trees for wood. Designate trees to cut using the harvest trees tool. Does not work on plants.
Chinese: 砍伐树木获取原木。需要使用砍伐树木工具指定需要砍伐的树木。不适用于植物。

English: Books improve mood or help other workers improve a skill. Books can also be traded. Writing a book requires a free bookshelf and paper.
Chinese: 书籍能够改善心情或帮助其他工人提高技能。书籍可以被交易。写作需要一个闲置的书架和纸张。

Key: No Squads found. Workers need to be put into squads to be controlled.
English:
No Squads found.

Workers need to be put into squads to be controlled.
Chinese: 没有找到小队。需要将殖民者加入编队以进行控制。

Key: No Workshops. Build a workshop to be able to order items.
English: No Workshops. Build a workshop to be able to order items.
Chinese: 无工坊。建立一个能够订购物品的工坊。

Key: No seeds found. Harvest wild crops to find seeds to plant.
English: No seeds found. Harvest wild crops to find seeds to plant.
Chinese: 无种子。收获野生作物以寻找种子来种植。

Key: Oops, Embark has crashed. The game will now try to save but it is recommended to load your previous save instead. Please use the upload save feature in the load game menu to upload the save game to help us find out what went wrong.
English:
Oops, Embark has crashed. The game will now try to save but it is recommended to load your previous save instead.
Please use the upload save feature in the load game menu to upload the save game to help us find out what went wrong.
Chinese: 抱歉，游戏发生了未知错误。游戏将会尝试保存，但建议您加载之前的存档。

English: Erosion during map generation, turn off if you are crashing during map generation.
Chinese: 地图生成时侵蚀，如果在地图生成期间崩溃则关闭侵蚀。

English: Higher value means that you scroll faster when zoomed out more.
Chinese: 该值越高表明在缩小时滚动速度越快

English: Speed at which camera moves around map.
Chinese: 镜头在地图上移动的速度

English: Use metric or imperial units for measurements
Chinese: 在游戏中使用公制或英制单位

English: Reduce if you are crashing during world generation
Chinese: 如果在世界生成期间崩溃则降低质量。

English: The starting area has an abundance of easily hunted animals.
Chinese: 起始区域内有大量可以被轻松猎杀的动物。

English: You start with some basic clothes.
Chinese: 开始游戏时有一些基本衣物。

English: You have more time to prepare for the first attack.
Chinese: 有更充裕的时间来应对第一次袭击。
开始游戏时有一大堆酒。
开始游戏时有一些饮品。

English: Everyone starts friendlier with each other.
Chinese: 每个人都彼此友好相处。

English: You start with a stash of wood.
Chinese: 开始游戏时有一堆木材。
每个人开始时都很快乐。

English: You start with some potato seeds
Chinese: 开始游戏时有一些马铃薯种子。

English: You start with some food and seeds for crops.
Chinese: 开始游戏时有一些食物和作物种子。

English: You start with an axe and a pick.
Chinese: 开始游戏时有斧头和稿。

English: You start with some basic weapons.
Chinese: 开始游戏时有一些基本武器。

Key: Please describe the bug and clearly describe the steps required to replicate the issue.
English: Please describe the bug and clearly describe the steps required to replicate the issue.
Chinese: 请描述您遇到的错误和遇到错误前的操作。

Key: Please fill in the email field
English: Please fill in the email field

Key: Preview Image (screenshot.png jpg gif in mod folder)
English: Preview Image (screenshot.png / jpg / gif in mod folder)

Key: Replace terrain material or right click to remove build wall orders.
English: Replace terrain material or right click to remove build wall orders.
Chinese: 替换地形材质或单击右键来移除建造墙的命令。

Key: Select a fresh water body for details. Fresh water is essential for the smooth running of a colony. Build a still near a water source to make drinks. Plants which are near water will grow faster. To make water flow upwards build pumps and windmills then connect them with mechanisms.
English:
Select a fresh water body for details.

Fresh water is essential for the smooth running of a colony. Build a still near a water source to make drinks. Plants which are near water will grow faster.

To make water flow upwards build pumps and windmills then connect them with mechanisms.
Chinese:
“选择一处淡水查看更多详细信息。

淡水对于一个群落的发展是必不可少的。在水源附近建一个酿酒台来制作饮料。靠近水的植物生长得更快。

为了使水向上流动，建造水泵和风车，然后用机械构件将它们连接起来。”

Key: Select a room to see details. Rooms are automatically created when small areas are completely enclosed with only one or more doors as exits.
English:
Select a room to see details.

Rooms are automatically created when small areas are completely enclosed with only one or more doors as exits.
Chinese:
“选择一个房间查看更多详细信息。

当一块小区域完全封闭，只有一个或多个门作为出口时，会自动创建房间。”

Key: Share your save game on the Steam Workshop.
English: Share your save game on the Steam Workshop.
Chinese: 在Steam创意工坊上分享您的存档

English: Penalty to quality of crafted items
Bonus to quality of crafted items

Key: Upload or update your mod to the Steam Workshop.
English: Upload or update your mod to the Steam Workshop.
Chinese: 将您的Mod上传或更新至Stema创意工坊。

Key: Upload your save game to help with finding bugs.
English: Upload your save game to help with finding bugs.
Chinese: 上传您的存档以帮助修复错误。

Key: Warning, temperatures are low in this area ({0}). Lower temperatures make starting out harder.
English: Warning, temperatures are low in this area ({0}). Lower temperatures make starting out harder.
Chinese: 警告，此区域温度较低（{0}）。低温会使开始更艰难。

Key: Workers will not havest plants which have not yet reached maturity.
English: Workers will not havest plants which have not yet reached maturity.
Chinese: 工人不能收获尚未成熟的植物。

Key: {0}{1}Select items which will be used to make {2}.
English: {0} {1} Select the items to use to create {2}.
